"""
Abstract exporter class for undirected graphs with known topologies.
"""

import abc
from config import *
from igraph import Graph

[docs]class IGraphExporter(object):
    __metaclass__ = abc.ABCMeta

    graph = None
    """:type: Graph"""

    def __init__(self, graph: Graph):
        self.graph = graph
        self.logger = log
